name: Soulsight
description:
At Soulsight, we believe every brand has a soul. Our mission then, is to build Soulful brands (and their businesses of course) through strategic design. We believe the soul of the brand is its emotional connection to the consumer. Uncovering the brand soul, enables the brand to engage the consumer on an emotional level which is designed to connect and communicate in ways that creates desire, elicits joy and builds brand loyalty.
Soulsight is a collection of multi-disciplined, strategic creatives who believe in the power of consumer-centric, design driven branding. We pride ourselves in our ability to consistently deliver inspiring, category- leading creative and thoughtful strategic guidance for some of the worldâ€™s best loved iconic brands. We respect and value every employee and position and strive to enable their personal and professional growth. Our core values include: Creativity, Respect, Honesty, Trust and Courage.
